title: [Large-Scale] Network-Based Learning Strategies: Problem-Solving Projects Through Entrepreneurial Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics concepts and teamwork experience
context.additional_context: Conducting problem-solving simulations based on real-world cases in a collaborative environment utilizing digital tools.

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more types of problems encountered in entrepreneurial situations and visualize them using network mapping tools
Learners can analytically explain the roles of network members and knowledge flow by applying storytelling techniques
Learners can predict the impact of network characteristics (density, centrality) on learning outcomes through mathematical modeling (e.g., graph theory)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
